author: Joseph Zucker
title: Jayson Tatum, Bradley Beal Announce COVID-19 Donations for Boston, St. Louis
description: Boston Celtics star Jayson Tatum and Washington Wizards star Bradley Beal are each donating $250,000 to provide meals in Boston and St. Louis amid the COVID-19 pandemic...
content:
Michael Dwyer/Associated Press
Boston Celtics star Jayson Tatum and Washington Wizards star Bradley Beal are each working to provide meals in Boston and St. Louis amid the COVID-19 pandemic.
Tatum announced the move on Instagram:
"As this virus continues t… [+1336 chars]
